body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug


**What happened**: 

Scheduler is still [checking `NodeOutOfDisk` condition](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/plugin/pkg/scheduler/factory/factory.go#L796-L822), which was already deprecated and removed from kubelet in #48846.

**What you expected to happen**: Scheduler should check `NodeDiskPressure` condition instead, or kubelet should keep posting `NodeOutOfDisk` condition.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

From [ci-kubernetes-e2e-gce-etcd3](https://k8s-testgrid.appspot.com/google-gce#gce-etcd3&width=5&sort-by-flakiness=), many tests (especially "Networking [k8s.io] Granular Checks: XXX") flake a lot because of [test pods couldn't be scheduled](https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-e2e-gce-etcd3/13400?log#log):
```
I0802 14:16:38.670] Aug  2 14:16:15.621: INFO: At 2017-08-02 14:10:47 +0000 UTC - event for netserver-2: {default-scheduler } FailedScheduling: No nodes are available that match all of the following predicates: MatchNodeSelector (2).
```

Checked [the scheduler logs](https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-e2e-gce-etcd3/13400/artifacts/bootstrap-e2e-master/kube-scheduler.log) and found scheduler kept ignoring node with `OutOfDiskCondition=Unknown`:
```
I0802 14:10:20.033375       5 factory.go:786] About to try and schedule pod ss2-2
I0802 14:10:20.033406       5 scheduler.go:255] Attempting to schedule pod: e2e-tests-statefulset-hq416/ss2-2
I0802 14:10:20.035150       5 factory.go:808] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-5734 with OutOfDisk condition status Unknown
I0802 14:10:20.035177       5 factory.go:817] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-master since it is unschedulable
I0802 14:10:20.038957       5 factory.go:1000] Attempting to bind ss2-2 to bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-8l5l
I0802 14:10:20.050075       5 event.go:218] Event(v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"e2e-tests-statefulset-hq416", Name:"ss2-2", UID:"513edd40-778c-11e7-8879-42010a800002", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"11216", FieldPath:""}): type: 'Normal' reason: 'Scheduled' Successfully assigned ss2-2 to bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-8l5l
I0802 14:10:20.461063       5 leaderelection.go:199] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I0802 14:10:22.285111       5 factory.go:786] About to try and schedule pod redis-master-w47l3
I0802 14:10:22.285164       5 scheduler.go:255] Attempting to schedule pod: e2e-tests-kubectl-vbz9w/redis-master-w47l3
I0802 14:10:22.285185       5 factory.go:817] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-master since it is unschedulable
I0802 14:10:22.285193       5 factory.go:808] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-5734 with OutOfDisk condition status Unknown
I0802 14:10:22.287388       5 factory.go:1000] Attempting to bind redis-master-w47l3 to bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-c2c0
I0802 14:10:22.299202       5 event.go:218] Event(v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"e2e-tests-kubectl-vbz9w", Name:"redis-master-w47l3", UID:"52967b38-778c-11e7-8879-42010a800002", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"11237", FieldPath:""}): type: 'Normal' reason: 'Scheduled' Successfully assigned redis-master-w47l3 to bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-c2c0
I0802 14:10:22.475869       5 leaderelection.go:199] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I0802 14:10:22.522684       5 factory.go:786] About to try and schedule pod pd-client
I0802 14:10:22.522710       5 scheduler.go:255] Attempting to schedule pod: e2e-tests-volume-l5kf0/pd-client
I0802 14:10:22.522729       5 factory.go:808] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-5734 with OutOfDisk condition status Unknown
I0802 14:10:22.522755       5 factory.go:817] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-master since it is unschedulable
...
I0802 14:13:52.962378       5 factory.go:786] About to try and schedule pod ss2-2
I0802 14:13:52.962425       5 scheduler.go:255] Attempting to schedule pod: e2e-tests-statefulset-llw0r/ss2-2
I0802 14:13:52.962445       5 factory.go:817] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-master since it is unschedulable
I0802 14:13:52.962453       5 factory.go:808] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-5734 with OutOfDisk condition status Unknown
I0802 14:13:52.965084       5 factory.go:1000] Attempting to bind ss2-2 to bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-c2c0
I0802 14:13:52.983876       5 event.go:218] Event(v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"e2e-tests-statefulset-llw0r", Name:"ss2-2", UID:"d02945f2-778c-11e7-8879-42010a800002", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"14604", FieldPath:""}): type: 'Normal' reason: 'Scheduled' Successfully assigned ss2-2 to bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-c2c0
I0802 14:13:53.681980       5 factory.go:786] About to try and schedule pod netserver-2
I0802 14:13:53.682007       5 scheduler.go:255] Attempting to schedule pod: e2e-tests-pod-network-test-l1hrr/netserver-2
I0802 14:13:53.682028       5 factory.go:817] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-master since it is unschedulable
I0802 14:13:53.682036       5 factory.go:808] Ignoring node bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-5734 with OutOfDisk condition status Unknown
I0802 14:13:53.682195       5 scheduler.go:167] Failed to schedule pod: e2e-tests-pod-network-test-l1hrr/netserver-2
I0802 14:13:53.682245       5 factory.go:932] Unable to schedule e2e-tests-pod-network-test-l1hrr netserver-2: no fit: No nodes are available that match all of the following predicates: MatchNodeSelector (2).; waiting
I0802 14:13:53.682289       5 factory.go:1009] Updating pod condition for e2e-tests-pod-network-test-l1hrr/netserver-2 to (PodScheduled==False)
I0802 14:13:53.682338       5 event.go:218] Event(v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"e2e-tests-pod-network-test-l1hrr", Name:"netserver-2", UID:"61a8b960-778c-11e7-8879-42010a800002", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"11659", FieldPath:""}): type: 'Warning' reason: 'FailedScheduling' No nodes are available that match all of the following predicates: MatchNodeSelector (2).
I0802 14:13:53.683567       5 backoff_utils.go:78] Backing off 1m0s
```

Haven't traced down why this `OutOfDisk=Unknown` only appeared on part of the nodes && in the middle of test, but it seems certainly problematic.

**Anything else we need to know?**:

This seems to be one of the causes that increase `pull-kubernetes-e2e-gce-etcd3`'s flakyness.

/sig node

@dashpole @fejta

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: kubelet stops posting NodeOutOfDisk condition while scheduler is still checking
